summary: Adds Lydia to the Companion Faction.
descriptionHtml:
What this mod does is make Lydia a Companion, when you tell her to part ways she will head over to Jorrvaskr instead to Dragonsreach or Breezehome. She will do the same stuff the Companions do, hang out in the main room, downstairs, eat, drink and so on.

I made this one for myself as I  like the Companions, the more ppl in Jorrvaskr the better :P
author: DimosZargarda
